title: India’s Chandrayaan-3 lander arrives in lunar orbit
summary: India will make its second moon landing attempt in 18 days’ time after its Chandrayaan-3 spacecraft arrived in lunar orbit Saturday.

title: Astra lays off, reassigns employees as it refocuses on satellite propulsion
summary: Astra Space announced Aug. 4 it has laid off a quarter of its workforce and reassigned others from launch vehicle to satellite propulsion development as its cash reserves dwindle.

title: A look at the surprising history of the earliest rocket pioneers
summary: A review of the book From the Earth to Mars.

title: Apple-backed Globalstar’s revenue jump underlines IoT opportunity
summary: Globalstar, the operator behind Apple’s satellite-enabled SOS app, posted a 50% year-on-year jump in quarterly sales Aug. 3 amid promising growth in its business for connecting remote Internet of Things devices.

title: Astra conducts layoffs, raises debt and shifts focus to spacecraft engines in bid to survive
summary: Struggling space company Astra is cutting 25% of its workforce, the company announced on Friday, and restructuring to focus more on its spacecraft engine business, which will delay progress on the small rocket it has been developing.

title: SpaceX performs Booster 9 engine test ahead of static fire
summary: Earlier today, SpaceX partially fueled Booster 9, continuing a series of tests before its eventual static fire test. For the spin prime...

title: Voyager 2 phones home and says everything is cool
summary: After sending the command, NASA had to wait 37 hours for a response.

title: China launches four rockets and outlines future lunar mission
summary: China has picked up its launch cadence in the last two weeks as they continue to push forward in its ambitious 2023 launch schedule. Not only did they launch three rockets from the Chang Zheng family in a short period of time, but also Gushenxing-1 from Site 95A at Jiuquan joined the mix with the “Lemon Tree” mission.

title: Booster 9 Completes Spin Prime Ahead of Critical 33 Engine Static Fire Test
summary: After successfully completing a "Chill and Spin" of its raptor engines, B9 readies for a static fire test as soon as this weekend.

title: VOYAGER 2 FULL COMMUNICATIONS RESTORED AFTER INTERSTELLAR SHOUT FROM NASA DSN
summary: NASA has reestablished full communications with Voyager 2 after a series of planned commands sent to NASA’s Voyager 2 spacecraft on July 21 inadvertently caused the antenna to point 2 degrees away from Earth.
